notes.text:
- i was just testing various staple backrows for amazoness n ended up kog, havent yet to test regretful rebirth.
- no 3rd onslaught (after 120 packs in), luckily i don't think i ever found a situation where i needed the 3rd one just yet since the deck's crazy consistent. 
- restart is op if u know get the idea what ur up against, just restart into tech cards u need.
- quickplay s/t destruction n tiger's eff were teh mvp, won me many games. also tiger > paladin > sage
- instalose vs geargia
